VIOLATIONS.VIOLATION_TITLE: P.L. 90-321 (82 Statute 146) per The Truth in Lending Act

CONSUMER_RIGHTS.RIGHT: Provide method for consumers concerning The Creditor privacy policies and practices (12 CFR § 1016 Regulation P);
Provide method for consumers to prevent institutions from disclosing information to third parties (12 CFR § 1016.10a);
Provide a clear and conspicuous notice that reflects privacy policies and practices;
The duration of the opt out is effective until The Creditee revokes the rights described in this section in writing or electronic consent-agreement (12 CFR § 1016.i);

REMEDY.REMEDY: Dismiss the intent to bring civil action against The Creditor in a court of law;
Dismiss filing a complaint(s) with respective enforcement agencies
